availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Horace Gates Wintersmith (Hardin County, KY, ass't tax assessor)

body.p: Hardin County, KY, tax assessor and notary public. Kentucky native. Son of Robert Lawrence Wintersmith and Euphemia Swan Wintersmith. Student in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Assistant tax assessor for Hardin and Larue Counties from 1862 to 1863. Appointed notary public in Hardin County on November 28, 1862. Secretary of Union Democrats of Hardin County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 7, p. 371A.
Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), March 14, 1863, p. 1.
"Horace Gates Wintersmith (1842-1866)," Find A Grave, Memorial #12118596, accessed January 10, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/12118596.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1838-1839, Film #000817877.
"Union Meeting in Hardin County" Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), March 13, 1863, p. 1.
